item.title: Boost Items
item.description: Introduction This article will explain how boosting items work in Adventure Quest Worlds. In particular, we will look into the interaction between the following boosts: XP/CP/Gold/REP boosts Damage to All like NSoD Damage to Races like Polly Roger The All Out stat To find your current boosts, look for the following icons on your stat panel: I will be linking items as examples, but many of them have alternatives and variants.
